name: Touhou: The Shrine Maiden (Demo)
description:
Introduction:

A derivative game based on Touhou Project with the style close to old NES game.

Gameplay:

An action platform game inspired by old NES games like 'Megaman' & 'Mitsume ga Tooru' but with Touhou Danmaku element in boss fights.
Player will exterminate youkais, collect coins, buy helpful items to help with their journey before challenge themselves in boss fight.

Team member:

Developer: Fairyhell
Music: 40Nix (Collabs)

Please consider a donation if you enjoyed the game as it helps the me finishing the game.
